bookcase.description: There are many book. All tattered and worn. Some appear to have been recently read. Upon closer investigation you see clue 4
bookcase.description2: There are only 4 books here. All tattered and worn.

clue.name: clue 4
clue.description: Beware for I am fearless, and therefore powerful (good luck)

something wicked.name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
something wicked.description: There appears to be nothing special about this book
something wicked.author: Ray Bradbury

it.name: It
it.description:
Someone appears to have ripped pieces from several pages.
They look about the size of the clues.
it.author: Stephen King

frankenstein.name: Frankenstein
frankenstein.description: There appears to be nothing special about this book
frankenstein.author: Mary Shelly

reprieve.name: Reprieve
reprieve.description: There appears to be nothing special about this book
reprieve.author: James Ham Mattson

west hall.description:
This hall has a smoothly hewn natural stone floor that have been polished smooth. A mouse scutters
across the floor. There is a bookcase at the end of the hall. The air smells stale.

cabinets.description: The cabinets are time worn, loosely hanging on to their hinges. They rats appear to have made a meal of them, judging by the holes. Upon closer investigation you see clue 3.
cabinets.description2: The cabinets are time worn, loosely hanging on to their hinges. They rats appear to have made a meal of them, judging by the holes.

clue.name: clue 3
clue.description: Reading is fundamental, but WHAT you read is key (2)

sink.description: The spoiled remains of food fill the sink

window.description: The window is barred from the outside, There is no way to get out.

kitchen.description:
The room is covered in dust and cobwebs. Glass shards cover the floor, and the smell of rust,
mildew, and spoiled food is pungent. The air is so thick you can almost taste it.
Roaches run up every wall and the faint sound of rats squeaking can be heard all around. The only way out is back south towards the parlor

east hall.description: This hall has a smoothly hewn natural stone floor that have been polished smooth.

sword.description: Rusted but sharp. Dried blood covers the tip.

vase.description: Like everything else in the house this vase is old and time worn. Upon closer investigation you see clue 2
vase.description2: Like everything else in the house this vase is old and time worn.

clue.name: clue 2
clue.description: Pale skin and bright red lips curled in a grin can entertain or terrify (strikes is)

east room.description:
There is nothing warm about that place. It smells of something evil and the darkness is surreal.
Not merely the type of darkness that comes from the absence of light, it was much more sinister.

streamers.description: Time has not treated these well

candle holders.description: Merely decorative. Covered in webs and dust, they appear to have not been used in some time

corpse.description: Looks like they have the same wrist clamp as me...guess they didn't make it out in time.

portrait.description: Eerily the eyes of the portrait seem to follow you around the room, upon closer evaluation you find clue 1
portrait.description2: Eerily the eyes of the portrait seem to follow you around the room

clue.name: clue 1
clue.description: Heavy is the head that wears the crown (you get)

parlor.description:
This room is large, bleak, and cold. It is quiet and somber and you fell a chill as the darkness
engulfs you. You can hear the sound of your heart beat echo throughout the room. The ceiling is a cathedral
vaulted (multi-domed) and with the tattered remains of what once must have been colorful streamers hanging
down. A corpse covered in webs lay against the north wall right next to the entrance of what appears to be a kitchen.
To the east lies a long dark hall and the west another. The room smells of mildew and decay.

note.description:
Your participation, is greatly appreciated. Hidden around the house you will find several clues to assist in your escape.
The prick I'm sure you felt injected a fast acting toxin into you blood stream, but worry not,
 all will be well if you can escape before our game timer hit 0

torch.description: The flame shows no signs of giving out, it may be useful

needle.description: A small needle protrudes from a crack in the ground where you awoke

basement.description:
There is a smell of decay and mold in the room. The pitch-black atmosphere is nearly impenetrable.
You stretch your eyes as wide as possible but can barely make out a feeble outline of some distant objects.
There is little light except for the for a small strip below the door at the top of the stairs and a small
torch which illuminates only what is in its immediate vicinity.
